segments.text: Hey Julie , you want to go grab something to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! What do you feel like having ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really feel like having a big juicy steak !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . OK . I don't eat meat , but that's fine , I am sure wherever we are going they will have other options right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know you were a vegetarian !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not , I am a vegan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A vegan . I don't eat or use any animal based products . I don't wear leather , eat eggs , drink milk or anything that comes from an animal . I used to be a pescatarian before , which basically means you don't eat meat , but still have fish and seafood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! That's interesting ! It must be tough !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a bit difficult to find vegetarian friendly restaurants sometimes , but since more and more people are vegetarians or vegans nowadays , it's getting a bit less difficult .
segments.speaker: S2
